subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kristaps Porzingis was productive once again, collecting 20 points and 14 rebounds. But he worked for everything, shooting 7 of 18 from the field against waves of defenders.
snippet: Kristaps Porzingis was productive once again, collecting 20 points and 14 rebounds. But he worked for everything, shooting 7 of 18 from the field against waves of defenders.
